description:
These casual Cevedale Pants for men are designed for the ambitious ski tourer: lightweight yet sufficiently robust for even the wildest tours.

With its ribbed structure on the inside, Tasmanian merino wool ensures excellent insulation and feels pleasant on the skin. These ski touring pants have a scuff resistant exterior and their elastic two-way stretch material adapts to your every move.

The Cevedale Pants for men are also easy on the eye: the map pocket on the thigh is made of traditional loden from the Austrian company Steiner, with contrasting colors used to highlight the zippers.
Protection against sharp edges on the inner leg and integrated gaiters make our ski touring pants reliable companions for a day in the snow.

Cevedale Pants for men are therefore versatile companions for long and short days of ski touring.
name: Ortovox Cevedale Pants, Reg - Mens
